articles.title: Asian Stocks Rise as Powell Signals Fed Will Cut: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian shares tracked Wall Street’s rally and gained the most in nearly two weeks as traders increased bets the Federal Reserve will lower interest rates next month following dovish comments by Chairman Jerome Powell.

articles.description: On Thursday, Southwind Foods, headquartered in Carson, California, recalled multiple brands of frozen shrimp potentially affected by radioactive contamination, according to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.
